Notes: An area that activates its SW_A switch if the player has spent the total requested number of time frames inside this area.

Obj_arg0.Name: Counter
Obj_arg0.Description: The required number of time frames to spend inside this area.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated after the required amount of time inside this area has passed.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
